column2: Construct Level 1 Naval Bases

Construct Level 4 Naval Bases
Construct Level 5 Naval Bases
Construct Level 6 Naval Bases

Constructing naval bases is a nightmare for larger nations. This decision will upgrade all existing ports to level 1. Your mouse hand will be thankful.

NOTE: Since the game can only determine the presence of a building (and not the actual building level), this decision will still show up when all your existing ports are improved.

Be a gentlemen! Do not abuse it for cheap instant colonial points or naval supply.

Construct Level 6 Forts
Will build Level 1 forts in any province that does not have one.

Will upgrade the levels of all forts that exist by 1, and will build level 2 forts in any province currently without a fort.\n\nNOTE: This is a ONE TIME USE decision as the game cannot determine the level of a fort once built.

Will upgrade the levels of all forts that exist by 1, and will build level 3 forts in any province currently without a fort.\n\nNOTE: This is a ONE TIME USE decision as the game cannot determine the level of a fort once built.

Will upgrade the levels of all forts that exist by 1, and will build level 5 forts in any province currently without a fort.\n\nNOTE: This is a ONE TIME USE decision as the game cannot determine the level of a fort once built.
Build level 6 forts in all owned provinces. This decision will always be available.
Ongoing Constructions
